body_html:
Yes, FIFO is the issue.
Consider you have a thread pool with N threads and 2*N tasks where first N tasks wait for completion of the last N tasks. If you start running last tasks first, everything is OK. If you start running first tasks, you deadlock.
body_text:
Yes, FIFO is the issue.
Consider you have a thread pool with N threads and 2*N tasks where first N tasks wait for completion of the last N tasks. If you start running last tasks first, everything is OK. If you start running first tasks, you deadlock.
body:
Yes, FIFO is the issue.
Consider you have a thread pool with N threads and 2*N tasks where first N tasks wait for completion of the last N tasks. If you start running last tasks first, everything is OK. If you start running first tasks, you deadlock.
